__e: He gets lost in his own mind, in his thoughts and his theories, and if you disagree with one of his constructs, he lashes out, gets violent.
All night you've had all these theories and opinions and suddenly you've nothing to say?
She's got these ideas and theories...
Can you share any theories as to what this is about, sir?
My brother. I guess we all have our reasons for why we think this is happening, some price we're paying for... things we've done wrong in our lives.
